You can calculate your expense deductions by tax year. select the vehicle and home office space options below.

You can deduct your vehicles expenses by using the standard deduction or by tracking the actual costs. Enter the odometer readings at the beginning and end of the year. If you select the "Actual Cost" vehicle method, enter the estimated percentage that you use your vehicle for business purposes.
Enter the total square footage of your home and the square footage of the space used for business.
You can recalculate your expense deductions if you have changed your Vehicle Usage Rate or your Home Usage Rate for this year.
Your expense deductions are calculated by tax year. Click the pencil icon to edit the annual expense options or click the "Create New Expense Option" link in the upper-right corner.
